diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Nephroblastoma in an ovotestis of a true hermaphrodite
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The final diagnosis was supported by the histological examination revealing a small cell malignant neoplasm consistent with nephroblastoma, identified in the biopsy of the right ovotestis, along with the presence of an ovotestis and associated structures like a corpus luteum cyst in the left ovotestis.
